isis.stitle: 530 and DT-466/408 Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1993) - ENGINE DIAGNOSTIC TOOLS - ROBERT BOSCH SMOKE SAMPLING KIT (SE-2580)

svcproc.title: ROBERT BOSCH SMOKE SAMPLING KIT (SE-2580)
svcproc.para:
The smoke sampling kit (Figure 4.19)
is used for reading smoke density at the exhaust stack at rated load and speed only to determine acceptability of smoke emission.

In the smokemeter, a sampling pump draws off a certain amount of exhaust gas from the exhaust pipe of the respective engine and then sucks it through a filter paper disk. The filter paper disk, in turn, darkens during this process and thus gives the measure of the soot content of the exhaust gases.
Refer to Section 5 for operation and maintenance instructions
